00022 extern bool CompareByArchive(const istd::IChangeable& object1, const istd::IChangeable& object2);

00026 template <class Base>
00027 class TCopySerializedWrap: public istd::TUpdateManagerWrap<Base>
00028 {
00029 public:
00030        typedef istd::TUpdateManagerWrap<Base> BaseClass;
00031 
00032        // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00033        virtual bool CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object);
00034        virtual bool IsEqual(const istd::IChangeable& object) const;
00035 };

00040 // pseudo-reimplemented (istd::IChangeable)
00041 
00042 template <class Base>
00043 bool TCopySerializedWrap<Base>::CopyFrom(const istd::IChangeable& object)
00044 {
00045        if (BaseClass::CopyFrom(object)){
00046               return true;
00047        }
00048        else{
00049               return CopyByArchive(object, *this);
00050        }
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template <class Base>
00055 bool TCopySerializedWrap<Base>::IsEqual(const istd::IChangeable& object) const
00056 {
00057        if ((GetSupportedOperations() & SO_COMPARE) && (object.GetSupportedOperations() & SO_COMPARE)){
00058               return BaseClass::IsEqual(object);
00059        }
00060 
00061        return CompareByArchive(object, *this);
00062 }
